price: 106. (El Faraón) dijo: “Si de verdad vienes con alguna prueba, muéstrala si eres de los veraces”.
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
